void pandora::ClusterContact::HitDistanceComparison ( Cluster *const   pDaughterCluster,
Cluster *const   pParentCluster,
const Parameters &  parameters 
) [protected]

Compare hits in daughter cluster with those in parent cluster to calculate minimum hit separation and close hit fractions.

Calculate these properties in a single loop, for efficiency.

Parameters:
pDaughterCluster address of the daughter candidate cluster
pParentCluster address of the parent candidate cluster
parameters the cluster contact parameters
